timeofday.data.night.name: Night
timeofday.data.night.description:
During <style="value">Night</style> time, certain restriction applies, typically any effect that is triggered using <style="value">Gold Mana</style> cannot be used as this type of Mana is <style="status">Inert</style> during Night time.

<style="value">Night</style> time also allows <style="value">Black Mana</style> to be used.
